data.name: HTTP Output
data.xml_template:
<route  id="{{source}}">
    <from uri="direct:{{source}}"/>
    {{setHeader "Exchange.CONTENT_TYPE" content_type "constant"}}
    {{#if (not_empty request_params)}}
        {{setHeader "Exchange.HTTP_QUERY" (request_querystring request_params) "constant"}}
    {{/if}}
    <to uri="{{protocol}}://{{hostname}}:{{port}}{{path}}{{querystring query_params extra_query_params}}"/>
    
    {{generateDestination target}}
</route>
